name: Home Sweet Home
description: Home Sweet Home is a first-person horror adventure game based on Thai myths and beliefs. The core gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid perilous spirits hunting you. Moreover, few puzzles are added into the game, making gameplay more various.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 560 or better Storage: 11 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA速 GeForce速 GTX 770 or better Storage: 11 GB available space
